name: The Basement (AkuVain)
description:
The Basement is a game that was created for a competition called "Taitaja" in around 5 hours, After some technical difficulties with the project turning pink we had no time to fix it and had to turn it in like that. Now that it's fixed, it's now playable.

Game's premise:

Mom went to get groceries and has tasked you to turn the basement lights off.

Who worked on this project:

Me - Coding

Kaspian - 3D Assets https://sketchfab.com/Kaspian.Seppanen

The game lighting is buggy and i'm not bothered to fix it.
